tafsirQuiz.question: What does this verse warn or promise?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: Whatever is related here about Doomsday refers apparently to an unknown world. An example of this is the present world itself
distractors: This verse describes the characteristics of believers
This verse discusses the creation of the universe
This verse explains the rules of inheritance

tafsirQuiz.question: What warning or glad tiding is mentioned in Surah Al-Inshiqaq, Ayah 6?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: In spite of such clear indications, there are those who do not believe in the Hereafter and live out their lives without ever taking it into account. Such individuals are certainly committing a crime which is deserving of the punishment mentioned above
distractors: This verse discusses the creation of the universe
This verse talks about the stories of previous prophets
This verse explains the rules of inheritance

tafsirQuiz.question: What consequence is described in this ayah?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: However, those who give a positive response to the call for Truth, in spite of different kinds of difficulties, will receive the greatest possible reward from Merciful God
distractors: This verse discusses the creation of the universe
This verse explains the rules of inheritance
This verse talks about the stories of previous prophets
